strings.Value: "Envoy Aldori is a curious type. I never expected to see a half-orc among the Swordlords."
"A noble and brave heart makes for a true knight, not a person's ancestry. And Sir Kassil possesses those virtues without a doubt."
"He was able to change a destiny that was written upon him by his very birth. He was able to find his own way. This is admirable."
"Kassil is a sweetheart. But he should smile more often â€” then he'd be priceless!"
